title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Jhumka - ఎమరాల్డ్ డైమండ్ జుంకా
materials: Faceted Emerald Center Stone (likely Zambian Emerald
Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Features Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed Jhumkas with a floral top featuring a central pear-shaped Emerald. The jhumka bell is densely encrusted with diamonds in a pave setting, creating a dazzling effect. Delicate gold detailing accents the diamond design. The jhumka base is fringed with pearl drops. This design blends traditional South Indian Jhumka styles with modern diamond-setting techniques.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Can also be worn for upscale modern events.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional design and modern elegance. The high-quality Emerald and brilliant-cut diamonds ensure a captivating sparkle. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail by skilled artisans from Hyderabad. This Jhumka is a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom.
